title: Australian diary. No. 034
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The items featured in this cinemagazine show the harvesting of apples in Tasmania; the manufacture of costume jewellery; the expoert of South Australian crayfish by air to the United States which is earning valuable export dollars; the work of Matron Shaw at the Crown-Street Women’s Hospital; and the parks and gardens of Canberra.
